H0.text: What style of music is synonymous with Perez Prado. Salsa

H1.text: What style of music is synonymous with Perez Prado. Rumba

H2.text: What style of music is synonymous with Perez Prado. Cha Cha Cha

H3.text: What style of music is synonymous with Perez Prado. Mambo

A4.text: Dámaso Pérez Prado has been recognized as a key figure in the refinement and popularization of mambo and Cuban dance music in general across the world in the 1950s.

A5.text: His big band adaptation of the danzón-mambo proved to be a worldwide success with hits such as 'Mambo No. 5', earning him the nickname 'The King of the Mambo'.
